body.name: Sony OLED 55 inch BRAVIA XR A75L Series 4K Ultra HD TV: Smart Google TV with Dolby Vision HDR and Exclusive Gaming Features for The Playstation® 5 XR55A75L- 2023 Model,Black
features: LIFELIKE PICTURE– The intelligent and powerful Cognitive Processor XR delivers a picture with wide dynamic contrast, detailed blacks, natural colors, and high peak brightness, replicating how we see the real world.
OLED CONTRAST AND COLOR– Pure black, lifelike brightness, and billions of accurate colors enhanced by XR OLED Contrast Pro and XR Triluminos Pro.
PREMIUM SMART TV – Get access to all your favorite streaming apps in one place with Google TV, and simply use your voice to search and ask questions with Google Assistant. Supports Apple AirPlay.

MOVIES ON US WITH BRAVIA CORE - Enjoy streaming high-bitrate, high-quality 4K UHD movies included with the BRAVIA CORE app. Get 5 credits to redeem on latest release movies and 12 months subscription on hundreds of classics.
ALL YOUR GAME SETTINGS IN ONE PLACE– Game Menu puts all your gaming picture settings and exclusive assist features in a single easy-to-manage interface.
HDMI 2.1 GAMING – Get the advantage in high-performance gaming with HDMI 2.1 features like 4K/120, VRR, and ALLM.

PERFECT FOR PLAYSTATION 5– Take your gaming to the next level with exclusive features Auto HDR Tone Mapping and Auto Genre Picture Mode for optimized picture quality while gaming and streaming on your PS5 console.
ENHANCED ENTERTAINMENT – Enjoy engaging and immersive cinematic content the way the creators intended, with support for Dolby Vision, IMAX Enhanced, Netflix Adaptive Calibrated Mode, and more.

THE SCREEN IS THE SPEAKER – With Acoustic Surface Audio and support for Dolby Atmos, hear true immersive audio with actuators that vibrate to produce sound from the entire screen perfectly matching the action.
WORKS WITH ALEXA – Through an Alexa enabled device, ask Alexa to change channels, adjust volume, and turn your TV on/off.
body.description: Experience unparalleled entertainment with pure OLED black and vibrant color, powered by the Cognitive Processor XR™. Immerse yourself in the detailed shadows and real-world hues that bring shows, movies, sports, and games to life in stunning detail. Hear all the nuances and clear dialogue in everything you watch with sound coming directly from the screen.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pure OLED black. Perfect for all your entertainment. BRAVIA XR A75L 4K HDR OLED GOOGLE TV

Intelligent and powerful TV processing See how real your entertainment can be, with immersive depth and lifelike picture quality, powered by Sony’s intelligent Cognitive Processor XR. Hundreds of thousands of individual on-screen elements are processed and remastered boosting color, contrast, and clarity, bringing astounding realism.

Billions of real-world colors Access billions of accurate colors and reproduce each shade with the subtle differences seen in the real world. XR Triluminos Pro enhances the range of hues and saturation, revealing extremely precise details within textures, and skin tones that look completely natural. Pure blacks and stunning highlights Feel the beauty of OLED contrast with pure black and lifelike brightness. XR OLED Contrast Pro analyzes and enhances the picture for immersive depth and realism, resulting in ultra-detailed shadows and crisp, clean peak highlights.

Movies on us with BRAVIA CORE With the BRAVIA CORE app, enjoy the latest Sony Pictures Entertainment titles and the largest IMAX Enhanced collection. Simply redeem the included credits to choose from hundreds of the latest releases. You’re also subscribed to an amazing selection of movies to stream anytime. The entertainment you love. With help from Google. With 700,000+ movies and TV episodes available across 10,000+ apps and 800+ live TV channels, Google TV takes streaming to the next level – bringing together your favorite entertainment from across your apps and organizing it all, just for you. Looking for something special? Just ask Google.

Perfect for PlayStation 5 Take your gaming to the next level with exclusive features Auto HDR Tone Mapping and Auto Genre Picture Mode for optimized picture quality while gaming and streaming on your PS5 console. Level up your gaming with HDMI 2.1 features With features such as 4K/120, VRR, and ALLM as specified in HDMI 2.1, BRAVIA XR TVs deliver a thrilling gaming experience. With 4K/120 you get up to 120fps on compatible games and Variable Refresh Rate (VRR) virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering.

Does this TV have enhanced audio? With Acoustic Surface Audio and support for Dolby Atmos, hear true immersive audio with actuators that vibrate to produce sound from the entire screen perfectly matching the action. Can you control this TV with your voice? Yes, you can ask Google to find movies, stream apps, play music, and control the TV - all with your voice. Even get answers, control smart home devices, and more. Press the Google Assistant button on your remote to get started. Does this TV work with AirPlay 2? Yes, with Apple AirPlay 2 you can share pictures, video or audio to your television right from your iPhone, iPad or Mac. Watch movies and shows from your favorite apps and the Apple TV app, or even Safari. Share your photos with everyone in the room. Does this TV work with Alexa? Yes, through an Alexa enabled device (sold separately), ask Alexa to change channels, adjust volume, and turn your TV on/off. Can you video chat? Yes with the optional BRAVIA CAM (sold separately) – you can video chat with family and friends using your big screen. Ambient Optimization Pro automatically adjusts the picture and sound according to your room environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality of picture and sound!
reviews.reviewText: It has a great picture. Reviews of oled TVs say that they're not very bright, this tv is plenty bright, so much so I had use the auto dim setting at nite. Sound is way better than my previous tv. The channel guide was clunky at first, but we're used to it now! No buyers remorse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my first sony tv and I'm really impressed. Realistic graphics, high quality picture, really good sound, and has gaming features particularly for ps5. VRR which is variable refresh rate helps lag, judder and screen tearing for a smoother gaming Iexperience. The Google aspect of it is really interactive with voice control and smooth transition for apps. It overall great choice for movies, gaming, or even surfing the web. I recommend this TV strongly to new sony buyers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 》A Huge Value For A Spectacular Sony Oled
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is on par with The Masters Series XBR OLED that I already own. Having the TV actually be the Center Speaker is a phenomenal technology. Sony is still the Industry Leader.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: nice bright tv and good size. fast shipping with care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Quality Control! Sony will not stand behind this product if yours is defective!
reviews.reviewText: The day after mounting this XR-65A75L, I noticed a series of small bubbles in 4 clumps all organized in a horizontal line across the screen about 8 inches from the top. The bubbles seem to be under the outermost layer of the screen. It isn’t noticeable in most viewing conditions, but it is highly evident when the TV is off or during darkly lit scenes or black images. I purchased this expensive television specifically for OLED’s ability to display deep black colors. Now when this television displays any dark scenes, all I see is the series of small defects lined up across the top third of the screen. I sent multiple photos to Sony in order to receive warranty coverage. After a week, Sony engineering determined that this is an acceptable defect and will not fix or replace my unit. I am returning this unit to Amazon and will never buy Sony again. I am just thankful I didn’t waste any money on a Sony sound system. I’ll be happily going back to LG or Samsung for my entertainment system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Oled TV. Brightness could be better.
reviews.reviewText: As usual with Sony, their TVs are state of the art. This is my 3rd Sony and second Sony Oled. Setup was relatively easy as I have a Google account and am familiar with the process. Although I am not a Google fan, the TV user interface is slick.The TV is in an upstairs bedroom. Brightness is set to max, so beware if you plan to use it in a bright room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s sony oled tv!
reviews.reviewText: I dont typically write product reviews but to help others that are shopping for oled tv, I figured i would provide some info. Between this model and A80L there are few minor differences. One the tv stand is not adjustable like the a80L. Two no built in mic inside the tv. However you can still speak into the remote should you choose to. Three built in sound system is different. This model is two channel set up rather than the 3 channels in the a80l. If you use external sound system this shouldnt be much of an issue. And that is it. Same panel, same processor, same os, and etc.I spent months doing research on which oled tv i should buy and decided to go with sony due to the following reasons. I use my tv primarily for streaming netflix, movies, and etc. I occasionally play ps5 also. I use this tv in a low sunlight environment where brightness isnt too much a factor. With some tweaks color accuracy was superb, along with image processing and up scaling. Honestly this is the reason i ended up with sony over LG. If your primary use is for gaming then i might suggest considering LG as well. Google os is snapy and easy to use unlike what lg and samsung comes with. So far i really enjoyed the tv with my sonos speaker setup and found no issues. With black friday sale approaching i was able to snag this for a good discount hence i strongly suggest for those who want a sony tv with minor sacrifice on thing i listed above.dont hesitate to buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Color and Sound, but TV Freezes
reviews.reviewText: We replaced our old Sony and Roku stick with this smart TV. The color and sound are great, but we have issues with it freezing up while searching for shows and we have been getting errors from one of our streaming apps. I have a good internet connection and speed and have done updates that were recommended by Sony Tech support. The issue has not been resolved, but not sure what else to try. Love the TV otherwise.
